alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 3:16AM EDT until March 25 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Cherokee County in southwestern North Carolina... Southeastern Bradley County in east Tennessee... Polk County in east Tennessee... Southern McMinn County in east Tennessee... Southern Monroe County in east Tennessee... * Until 415 AM EDT. * At 315 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near East Cleveland, or near Cleveland, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Madisonville, Benton, Ducktown, Etowah, Charleston, Englewood, Tellico Plains, Calhoun and William L. Davenport Refuge. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 38 and 39. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
